member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Account
member.summary: Account related data information for the transaction being sent to the web service.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Account.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: A unique user ID associated with the end-user in your system. If your system allows the login name for the account to be changed, this should not be the login name for the account, but rather should be an internal ID that does not change. This is not your MaxMind account ID.
The username associated with the account. This is not the MD5 of username. Rather, the MD is automatically generated from this string.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Account.UserId
member.summary: A unique user ID associated with the end-user in your system. If your system allows the login name for the account to be changed, this should not be the login name for the account, but rather should be an internal ID that does not change. This is not your MaxMind user ID.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Account.Username
member.summary: The username associated with the account. This is not the MD5 of username. Rather, the MD5 is automatically generated from this string.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Account.UsernameMD5
member.summary: The MD5 generated from the Username

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Account.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The first name of the end user as provided in their billing information.
The last name of the end user as provided in their billing information.
The company of the end user as provided in their billing information.
The first line of the user’s billing address.
The second line of the user’s billing address.
The city of the user’s billing address.
The ISO 3166-2 subdivision code for the user’s billing address.
The two character ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the user’s billing address.
The postal code of the user’s billing address.
The phone number without the country code for the user’s billing address.
The country code for phone number associated with the user’s billing address.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.CreditCard
member.summary: The credit card information for the transaction being sent to the web service.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.CreditCard.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Char},System.Nullable{System.Char},System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The issuer ID number for the credit card. This is the first 6 digits of the credit card number. It identifies the issuing bank.
The last four digits of the credit card number.
The name of the issuing bank as provided by the end user
The phone country code for the issuing bank as provided by the end user.
The phone number, without the country code, for the issuing bank as provided by the end user.
The address verification system (AVS) check result, as returned to you by the credit card processor. The minFraud service supports the standard AVS codes.
The card verification value (CVV) code as provided by the payment processor.
A token uniquely identifying the card. This should not be the actual credit card number.

member.summary: The issuer ID number for the credit card. This is the first 6 digits of the credit card number. It identifies the issuing bank.

member.summary: The last four digits of the credit card number.

member.summary: The name of the issuing bank as provided by the end user.

member.summary: The phone country code for the issuing bank as provided by the end user.

member.summary: The phone number, without the country code, for the issuing bank as provided by the end user.

member.summary: The address verification system (AVS) check result, as returned to you by the credit card processor. The minFraud service supports the standard AVS codes.

member.summary: The card verification value (CVV) code as provided by the payment processor.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.CustomInputs.Builder.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a custom input string.
member.param: The key for the string input defined in your account portal.
The input value. The string length must be less than or equal to 255 characters and the string must not contain a newline character.

member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The IP address associated with the device used by the customer in the transaction.
The HTTP “User-Agent” header of the browser used in the transaction.
The HTTP “Accept-Language” header of the device used in the transaction.

The number of seconds between the creation of the user's session and the time of the transaction. Note that sessionAge is not the duration of the current visit, but the time since the start of the first visit.
A string up to 255 characters in length. This is an ID that uniquely identifies a visitor's session on the site.

member.summary: The email information for the transaction being sent to the web service.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Email.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The user's email address. This will be converted into an MD5 before being sent to the web service.
The domain of the email address used in the transaction. If address is passed to the constructor and domain is not, the domain will be automatically set from the address.
By default, the address will be sent in plain text. If hashAddress is set to true, the address will instead be sent as an MD5 hash.

member.summary: The MD5 generated from the email address.

member.summary: The email address used in the transaction.

member.summary: The address value that will be sent in the request.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Email.Domain
member.summary: The domain of the email address.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Email.HashAddress
member.summary: By default, the address will be sent in plain text. If this is set to true, the address will instead be sent as an MD5 hash.

member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Your internal ID for the transaction. We can use this to locate a specific transaction in our logs, and it will also show up in email alerts and notifications from us to you.
Your internal ID for the shop, affiliate, or merchant this order is coming from. Required for minFraud users who are resellers, payment providers, gateways and affiliate networks.
The date and time the event occurred. If this field is not in the request, the current time will be used.
The type of event being scored.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.ShoppingCartItem.Price
member.summary: The per-unit price of the item in the shopping cart. This should use the same currency as the order currency.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReportTag
member.summary: Enumerated transaction report tags supported by the web service.

member.name: F:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReportTag.NotFraud
member.summary: The transaction was not fraudulent.

member.name: F:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReportTag.SuspectedFraud
member.summary: You suspect the transaction is fraudulent but you have not received a chargeback.

member.name: F:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReportTag.SpamOrAbuse
member.summary: The transaction is spam or abuse but you have not received a chargeback.

member.name: F:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReportTag.Chargeback
member.summary: There was a chargeback on this transaction.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport
member.summary: The transaction information for a report you would like to file with MaxMind.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReportTag,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The IP address reported to MaxMind for the transaction.
The TransactionReportTag indicating the type of report being made.
A string which is provided by your payment processor indicating the reason for the chargeback.

A unique eight character string identifying a minFraud Standard or Premium request. These IDs are returned in the maxmindID field of a response for a successful minFraud request. This field is not required, but you are encouraged to provide it, if possible.

A UUID that identifies a minFraud Score, minFraud Insights, or minFraud Factors request. This ID is returned at /id in the response. This field is not required, but you are encouraged to provide it if the request was made to one of these services.

Your notes on the fraud tag associated with the transaction. We manually review many reported transactions to improve our scoring for you so any additional details to help us understand context are helpful.
The transaction ID you originally passed to minFraud. This field is not required, but you are encouraged to provide it or the transaction's >maxmindId or minfraudId.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport.IPAddress
member.summary: The IP address reported to MaxMind for the transaction.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport.Tag
member.summary: The TransactionReportTag indicating the type of report being made.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport.ChargebackCode
member.summary:
A string which is provided by your payment processor indicating
the reason for the chargeback.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport.MaxMindId
member.summary: A unique eight character string identifying a minFraud Standard or Premium request. These IDs are returned in the maxmindID field of a response for a successful minFraud request. This field is not required, but you are encouraged to provide it, if possible.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport.MinFraudId
member.summary: A UUID that identifies a minFraud Score, minFraud Insights, or minFraud Factors request. This ID is returned at /id in the response. This field is not required, but you are encouraged to provide it if the request was made to one of these services.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport.Notes
member.summary: Your notes on the fraud tag associated with the transaction. We manually review many reported transactions to improve our scoring for you so any additional details to help us understand context are helpful.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport.TransactionId
member.summary: The transaction ID you originally passed to minFraud. This field is not required, but you are encouraged to provide it or the transaction's >maxmindId or minfraudId.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Address
member.summary: General address response data.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Address.IsInIPCountry
member.summary: This property is true if the address is in the IP country. The property is false when the address is not in the IP country. If the address could not be parsed or was not provided or if the IP address could not be geolocated, the property will be null.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Address.IsPostalInCity
member.summary: This property is true if the postal code provided with the address is in the city for the address. The property is false when the postal code is not in the city. If the address was not provided or could not be parsed, the property will be null.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Address.Latitude
member.summary: The latitude associated with the address.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Address.Longitude
member.summary: The longitude associated with the address.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Address.DistanceToIPLocation
member.summary: The distance in kilometers from the address to the IP location.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Address.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.BillingAddress
member.summary: Information about the billing address.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard
member.summary: Information about the credit card based on the issuer ID number.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard.Brand
member.summary: The credit card brand.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard.Country
member.summary: The two letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code associated with the location of the majority of customers using this credit card as determined by their billing address. In cases where the location of customers is highly mixed, this defaults to the country of the bank issuing the card.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard.IsBusiness
member.summary: This property is true if the card is a business card.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard.IsIssuedInBillingAddressCountry
member.summary: This field is true if the country of the billing address matches the country of the majority of customers using that IIN. In cases where the location of customers is highly mixed, the match is to the country of the bank issuing the card.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard.IsPrepaid
member.summary: This property is true if the card is a prepaid card.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard.IsVirtual
member.summary: This property is true if the card is a virtual card.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard.Issuer
member.summary: An object containing information about the credit card issuer.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard.Type
member.summary: The credit card type.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.CreditCard.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Device
member.summary: This object contains information about the device that MaxMind believes is associated with the IP address passed in the request. In order to receive device output from minFraud Insights or minFraud Factors, you must be using the Device Tracking Add-on.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Device.Confidence
member.summary: A number representing the confidence that the DeviceId refers to a unique device as opposed to a cluster of similar devices. A confidence of 0.01 indicates very low confidence that the device is unique, whereas 99 indicates very high confidence.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Device.Id
member.summary: A UUID that MaxMind uses for the device associated with this IP address. Note that many devices cannot be uniquely identified because they are too common (for example, all iPhones of a given model and OS release). In these cases, the minFraud service will simply not return a UUID for that device.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Device.LastSeen
member.summary: The date and time of the last sighting of the device.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Device.LocalTime
member.summary: The local date and time of the transaction in the time zone of the device. This is determined by using the UTC offset associated with the device. This is an RFC 3339 date-time

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Device.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Disposition
member.summary: This object contains the disposition set by custom rules.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Disposition.Action
member.summary: The action to take on the transaction as defined by your custom rules. The current set of values are "accept", "manual_review", and "reject". If you do not have custom rules set up, null will be returned.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Disposition.Reason
member.summary: The reason for the action. The current possible values are "custom_rule", "block_list", and "default". If you do not have custom rules set up, null will be returned.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Disposition.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Email
member.summary: This object contains information about the email address passed in the request.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Email.Domain
member.summary: An object containing information about the email address domain.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Email.FirstSeen
member.summary: The date the email address was first seen by MaxMind.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Email.IsDisposable
member.summary: This property incidates whether the email is from a disposable email provider. The value will be null if no email address or email domain was passed as an input.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Email.IsFree
member.summary: This property is true if MaxMind believes that this email is hosted by a free email provider such as Gmail or Yahoo! Mail.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Email.IsHighRisk
member.summary: This property is true if MaxMind believes that this email is likely to be used for fraud. Note that this is also factored into the overall risk_score in the response as well.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Email.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.EmailDomain
member.summary: This object contains information about the email address domain passed in the request.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.EmailDomain.FirstSeen
member.summary: The date the email address domain was first seen by MaxMind.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.EmailDomain.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Factors
member.summary: Model for Insights response.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Factors.Subscores
member.summary: An object containing GeoIP2 and minFraud Insights information about the IP address.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Factors.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.GeoIP2Country
member.summary: A subclass of the GeoIP2 Country model with minFraud-specific additions.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.GeoIP2Country.IsHighRisk
member.summary: This is true if the IP country is high risk.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.GeoIP2Country.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.GeoIP2Location
member.summary: A subclass of the GeoIP2 Location model with minFraud-specific additions.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.GeoIP2Location.LocalTime
member.summary: The date and time of the transaction in the time zone associated with the IP address.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.GeoIP2Location.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.IIPAddress
member.summary: An interface for IP address risk classes.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.IIPAddress.Risk
member.summary: The risk associated with the IP address. The value ranges from 0.01 to 99. A higher score indicates a higher risk.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Insights
member.summary: Model for Insights response.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Insights.IPAddress
member.summary: An object containing GeoIP2 and minFraud Insights information about the IP address.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Insights.CreditCard
member.summary: An object containing minFraud data about the credit card used in the transaction.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Insights.Device
member.summary: This object contains information about the device that MaxMind believes is associated with the IP address passed in the request.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Insights.Email
member.summary: This object contains information about the email address passed in the request.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Insights.ShippingAddress
member.summary: An object containing minFraud data related to the shipping address used in the transaction.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Insights.BillingAddress
member.summary: An object containing minFraud data related to the billing address used in the transaction.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Insights.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.IPAddress
member.summary: Model for minFraud GeoIP2 Insights data.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.IPAddress.Country
member.summary: Country object for the requested IP address. This record represents the country where MaxMind believes the IP is located.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.IPAddress.Location
member.summary: Location object for the requested IP address.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.IPAddress.MaxMind
member.summary: This property is not provided by minFraud.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.IPAddress.Risk
member.summary: The risk associated with the IP address. The value ranges from 0.01 to 99. A higher score indicates a higher risk.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.IPAddress.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Issuer
member.summary: Model for the credit card issuer data from minFraud.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Issuer.Name
member.summary: The name of the bank which issued the credit card.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Issuer.MatchesProvidedName
member.summary: This property is true if the name matches the name provided in the request for the card issuer. It is false if the name does not match. The property is null if either no name or no issuer ID number (IIN) was provided in the request or if MaxMind does not have a name associated with the IIN.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Issuer.PhoneNumber
member.summary: The phone number of the bank which issued the credit card. In some cases the phone number we return may be out of date.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Issuer.MatchesProvidedPhoneNumber
member.summary: This property is true if the phone number matches the number provided in the request for the card issuer. It is false if the number does not match. It is null if either no phone number or no issuer ID number(IIN) was provided in the request or if MaxMind does not have a phone number associated with the IIN.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Issuer.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Score
member.summary: Model class for Score response.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Score.Disposition
member.summary: This object contains information about the disposition set by custom rules.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Score.FundsRemaining
member.summary: The approximate US dollar value of the funds remaining on your MaxMind account.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Score.Id
member.summary: This is a UUID that identifies the minFraud request. Please use this ID in support requests to MaxMind so that we can easily identify a particular request.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Score.IPAddress
member.summary: An object containing information about the IP address's risk.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Score.QueriesRemaining
member.summary: The approximate number of queries remaining for this service before your account runs out of funds.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Score.RiskScore
member.summary: This property contains the risk score, from 0.01 to 99. A higher score indicates a higher risk of fraud.For example, a score of 20 indicates a 20% chance that a transaction is fraudulent.We never return a risk score of 0, since all transactions have the possibility of being fraudulent.Likewise we never return a risk score of 100.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Score.Warnings
member.summary: This list contains objects detailing issues with the request that was sent such as invalid or unknown inputs. It is highly recommended that you check this array for issues when integrating the web service.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Score.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.ScoreIPAddress
member.summary: The IP addresses risk.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.ScoreIPAddress.Risk
member.summary: The risk associated with the IP address. The value ranges from 0.01 to 99. A higher score indicates a higher risk.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.ScoreIPAddress.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.ShippingAddress
member.summary: Information about the shipping address.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.ShippingAddress.IsHighRisk
member.summary: This property is true if the shipping address is in the IP country. The property is false when the address is not in the IP country. If the shipping address could not be parsed or was not provided or the IP address could not be geolocated, then the property is null.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.ShippingAddress.DistanceToBillingAddress
member.summary: The distance in kilometers from the shipping address to billing address.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.ShippingAddress.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores
member.summary: This class contains subscores for many of the individual components that are used to calculate the overall risk score.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.AvsResult
member.summary: The risk associated with the AVS result. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.BillingAddress
member.summary: The risk associated with the billing address. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.BillingAddressDistanceToIPLocation
member.summary: The risk associated with the distance between the billing address and the location for the given IP address. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.Browser
member.summary: The risk associated with the browser attributes such as the User-Agent and Accept-Language. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.Chargeback
member.summary: Individualized risk of chargeback for the given IP address on your account and shop ID. This is only available to users sending chargeback data to MaxMind. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.Country
member.summary: The risk associated with the country the transaction originated from. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.CountryMismatch
member.summary: The risk associated with the combination of IP country, card issuer country, billing country, and shipping country. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.CvvResult
member.summary: The risk associated with the CVV result. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.Device
member.summary: The risk associated with the device. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.EmailAddress
member.summary: The risk associated with the particular email address. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.EmailDomain
member.summary: The general risk associated with the email domain. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.EmailLocalPart
member.summary: The risk associated with the email address local part (the part of the email address before the @ symbol). If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.EmailTenure
member.summary: The risk associated with the issuer ID number on the email domain. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.IPTenure
member.summary: The risk associated with the issuer ID number on the IP address. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.IssuerIdNumber
member.summary: The risk associated with the particular issuer ID number (IIN) given the billing location and the history of usage of the IIN on your account and shop ID. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.OrderAmount
member.summary: The risk associated with the particular order amount for your account and shop ID. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.PhoneNumber
member.summary: The risk associated with the particular phone number. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.ShippingAddress
member.summary: The risk associated with the shipping address. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.ShippingAddressDistanceToIPLocation
member.summary: The risk associated with the distance between the shipping address and the location for the given IP address. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.TimeOfDay
member.summary: The risk associated with the local time of day of the transaction in the IP address location. If present, this is a value in the range 0.01 to 99.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Subscores.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Warning
member.summary: A warning returned by the web service.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Warning.Code
member.summary: This value is a machine-readable code identifying the warning. See the web service documentation for the current list of of warning codes.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Warning.Message
member.summary: This property provides a human-readable explanation of the warning. The description may change at any time and should not be matched against.

member.name: P:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Warning.InputPointer
member.summary: A JSON Pointer to the input field that the warning is associated with. For instance, if the warning was about the billing city, this would be /billing/city. If it was for the price in the second shopping cart item, it would be /shopping_cart/1/price.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.Response.Warning.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: T:MaxMind.MinFraud.WebServiceClient
member.summary: Client for querying the minFraud Score and Insights web services.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.WebServiceClient.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler)
member.summary: Constructor for minFraud web service client.
member.param: Your MaxMind account ID.
Your MaxMind license key.
A list of locale codes to use for name property.
The host to use when connecting to the web service.
The timeout to use for the request.
Handler to use in request. The handler will be disposed.

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.WebServiceClient.FactorsAsync(MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Transaction)
member.summary: Asynchronously query Factors endpoint with transaction data
member.param: Object containing the transaction data to be sent to the minFraud web service.
member.returns: Task that produces an object modeling the minFraud Factors response data

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.WebServiceClient.InsightsAsync(MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.Transaction)
member.summary: Asynchronously query Insights endpoint with transaction data
member.param: Object containing the transaction data to be sent to the minFraud web service.
member.returns: Task that produces an object modeling the minFraud Insights response data

member.name: M:MaxMind.MinFraud.WebServiceClient.ReportAsync(MaxMind.MinFraud.Request.TransactionReport)
member.summary: Asynchronously query the minFraud Report Transaction API.
member.remarks: Reporting transactions to MaxMind helps us detect about 10-50% more fraud and reduce false positives for you.
member.param: The transaction report you would like to send.
member.returns: The Task on which to await. The web service returns no data and this API will throw an exception if there is an error.
